name: BibleFactsGame
0:
”Alexa open Bible facts”
”Alexa ask Bible facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell Bible facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bible facts
des:
Ask for Bible Facts and get interesting information.

Bible Facts provides edification all can enjoy and is guaranteed to pique your interest.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Bible Facts" or "Alexa, open Bible Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop" or " Alexa, cancel"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
